page.title: 19An Italian Family, St Ives
page.content:
This family live in Bridge Terrace in St Ives. Mother and father moved to England in 1971. They have three children, Donata, Filomena and Michelle, aged 13, 11 and 9 respectively. The two eldest children attend St Ivo Comprehensive school and the youngest attends Hemingford Grey primary school.
The parents have become used to living in a foreign country. They tend to lead an Italian form of life at home. Although the children were born in England, the whole family speak Italian at home. Mother still finds English a little difficult. They have relations living locally and in Ely.
The main differences they find are shop opening hours and the weather.
